settings.heading: A modern unisex bib brand for 0-6 years old, founded by Alana and Clara – inspired by our kids and their wild imaginations.

settings.title: Established 2022
settings.text:
We’re a modern unisex bib brand for baby & toddlers (we don’t believe in blue is just for boys and pinks are just for girls) . Inspired by our kids and their wild imaginations. We love when creativity runs wild! Me, Alana Ruas and Clara Lins got on as soon as we met, with our Dutch-Brazilian families, my background in fashion & product design and Clara biomedicine & fertility, sparked a fusion of arts meets science. Friends meets business partners. Clever Pepper was born.

Why are we called Clever Pepper?

In Brazil, 'pimentinha,' means 'little chilli pepper,' it's an affectionate way to describe kids who are active, intelligent, curious and sometimes a bit cheeky. Our name is part rhyming game “Clever”, part Brazilian “Pepper”.

settings.title: Our values
settings.text:
For us, quality and clever practical designs are extremely important. We want to offer playful and creative products with exclusive prints, delicate, simple designs yet spicy with a lot of personality. That not only does no harm to our little one’s health but also has little impact on the environment.

We value the power of good quality materials so that it can be passed on from little pepper to little pepper, to encourage consumption in a conscious way. Created so you spend less time washing and wiping and more time playing, bonding, caring for our little ones.
